channel.title: Lumen on Petfactory
channel.description: Recent content in Lumen on Petfactory

item.title: UE5 - Lumen
item.description: Lumen General Info Surface Cache Lumen generates an automatic parameterization of the nearby scene surfaces called the Surface Cache It is used to quickly look up lighting at ray hit points in the scene Lumen the captures the material properties for each mesh from multiple angles. These capture positions called cards are generated offline for each mesh Screen Tracing Lumen features trace rays against the screen first Before moving on to a more reliable method, if no hit is found or the ray passes behind a surface.
